summary: A young woman living with her family on the frontier in Quebec, Canada, endures the hardships of isolation and climate, and chooses between three suitors: a trapper, a farmer, and an ... See full summary »
cast: Madeleine Renaud|Suzanne Desprès|Gaby Triquet|Maximilienne|Jean Gabin|Jean-Pierre Aumont|André Bacqué|Alexandre Rignault|Daniel Mendaille|Robert Le Vigan|Thomy Bourdelle|Edmond Van Daële|Émile Genevois|Fred Barry|Pierre Laurel|Gustave Hamilton|Julien Clément|Jacques Langevin|Maurice Tillet|Max Monroy
title: Maria Chapdelaine
